name: Re:DESTINY
description:
Re:DESTINY is the story centers on Uchiha Tsukikagei, a coldheartedness who suddenly finds himself transported to another world. In this weird world, he will own his destiny and become God of Heaven and Earth with eternal death. This is a game that combines match-3 with light RPG elements, a GALGAME style of presentation with ecchi beauties. The story goes is choice-based so your choices will decide their destiny.

Features:

  • Match-3 with light RPG elements
  • Beautiful character art
  • Choices matter & multiple Endings
  • Japan-inspired story and design
  • Unique skill tree
  • Diversity of items
